Create a Co-occurrence Matrix Table of Codes

Source: R/create_cooccur_matrix.R
create_cooccur_matrix.Rd

Create a Co-occurrence Matrix Table of Codes

Usage

create_cooccur_matrix(
  excerpts,
  min_bold = 10,
  scale = c("count", "proportion"),
  output = c("kable", "tibble", "data.frame")
)

Arguments

excerpts

A data frame with one column named media_title identifying transcripts, and code columns beginning with "c_" (logical or numeric).

min_bold

Threshold for bolding co-occurrence values in the table.

scale

Whether to display raw "count" or "proportion" (normalized by the number of transcripts where each code appears). Defaults to "count".

output

Type of output: "kable" (default), "tibble", or "data.frame".

Value

Depending on output, either:

  • a knitr::kable HTML table,

  • a tibble,

  • or a base R data frame.
